Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at California/56th
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 59th, Kedzie, 55th, and California due to, street blockage near California/56th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 59th, Kedzie, 55th, and California due to, street blockage near California/56th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Garfield. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Garfield.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
